title: Tournaments
description: Information about Greater Fox Cities BA tournaments, including upcoming events and registration details.

sections.heading: Tournament Information
sections.content: The Greater Fox Cities Bowling Association hosts several tournaments throughout the year. Check back regularly for updates on upcoming events and registration information.

items.title: Youth Association Tournament
items.description: November 1-2 / 8-9 / 15-16, 2025 at Electric City Lanes, Kaukauna

items.title: Open Association Tournament
items.description: January 10-11 / 17-18, 2026 at Rolling Thunder Lanes, Neenah

items.title: Women's Association Tournament
items.description: January 10-11 / 17-18, 2026 at Rolling Thunder Lanes, Neenah
